title: Slow Down for No Reason
content: “Safety” has become both an excuse as well as an obsession (the two things are related of course). The public has been conditioned to accept – with a servility that would embarrass Stalin’s chicken – that it must obey whenever the magic word is uttered…. and the government knows it can impose almost anything by uttering the magic word.    No matter how ridiculous or obnoxious, if it keeps us saaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaafe then it must be a good thing.    The post Slow Down for No Reason appeared first on EPautos - Libertarian Car Talk .

“Safety” has become both an excuse as well as an obsession (the two things are related of course). The public has been conditioned to accept – with a servility that would embarrass Stalin’s chicken – that it must obey whenever the magic word is uttered…. and the government knows it can impose almost anything by uttering the magic word.

No matter how ridiculous or obnoxious, if it keeps us saaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaafe then it must be a good thing.
